title: This Is Your Brain on Pollution (Ep. 472 Update)
description: As the Biden administration rushes to address climate change, Stephen Dubner looks at another, hidden cost of air pollution — one that’s affecting how we think.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
